Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Manage users, projects and modules, see what is published and so on. There are a lot of administrative tasks in a content management system. Here you get an overview of administrative tasks.

Also watch out for the "Administration view" that provides a graphical user interface for most of the tasks.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Manage users, project, modules, etc. Get an overview on the administrative tasks in OpenCms.
